languages.text: {n}Маражай едва слышно вздыхает — и вы не можете понять, наигранно или искренне его удивление.{/n} "А, ценитель{mf||ница} всех оттенков власти? Что ж..." {n}Он одним движением выкручивает руку из вашей хватки и смотрит на вас из-под полуопущенных век.{/n} "Я услышал тебя, {name}. И это может быть... необычно".

{n}Marazhai lets out a barely audible gasp, and you cannot tell if his surprise is real or feigned.{/n} "Ah, a connoisseur of power in all its hues? Then..." {n}In a single move, he twists his arm out of your grasp and looks at you from beneath half-lowered lids.{/n} "You have made yourself clear, {name}. This could be... interesting."

Что ж..." {n}Он одним движением выкручивает руку из вашей хватки и смотрит на вас из-под полуопущенных век.{/n} "Я услышал тебя, {name}. И это может быть... необычно".

languages.text: {n}Marazhai suelta un jadeo apenas audible y no sabes si su sorpresa es real o fingida.{/n} «Ah, un{mf||a} conocedor{mf||a} del poder en todas sus facetas, ¿eh? Entonces...». {n}Con un solo movimiento, se zafa de tu presa y te mira con ojos entrecerrados.{/n} «Has dejado bien claras las cosas, {name}. Esto podría ser... interesante».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a barely audible gasp, and you cannot tell if his surprise is real or feigned.{/n} "Ah, a connoisseur of power in all its hues? Then..." {n}In a single move, he twists his arm out of your grasp and looks at you from beneath half-lowered lids.{/n} "You have made yourself clear, {name}. This could be... interesting."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai suelta un jadeo apenas audible y no sabes si su sorpresa es real o fingida.{/n} «Ah, un{mf||a} conocedor{mf||a} del poder en todas sus facetas, ¿eh? Entonces...». {n}Con un solo movimiento, se zafa de tu presa y te mira con ojos entrecerrados.{/n} «Has dejado bien claras las cosas, {name}. Esto podría ser... interesante».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋发出了几乎低不可闻的喘息，你无法判断他的惊讶是真的，还是装出来的。{/n}“啊，你可真是个喜欢发号施令的人啊，是吧？那么……”{n}他一下子就把胳膊从你的手里抽了出来，半垂的双眼看着你。{/n}“你的话说得很清楚了，{name}。或许这会……很有意思。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a barely audible gasp, and you cannot tell if his surprise is real or feigned.{/n} "Ah, a connoisseur of power in all its hues? Then..." {n}In a single move, he twists his arm out of your grasp and looks at you from beneath half-lowered lids.{/n} "You have made yourself clear, {name}. This could be... interesting."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋发出了几乎低不可闻的喘息，你无法判断他的惊讶是真的，还是装出来的。{/n}“啊，你可真是个喜欢发号施令的人啊，是吧？那么……”{n}他一下子就把胳膊从你的手里抽了出来，半垂的双眼看着你。{/n}“你的话说得很清楚了，{name}。或许这会……很有意思。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは、かろうじて聞こえる程度にはっと息を呑む。しかしその驚きが本物なのか、それとも見せかけのものなのかは分からない。{/n}「ああ、色々な力の見せ方に通じているようだな。それなら…」{n}一気に腕をひねってあなたの手から逃れ、半分下がった瞼の下からあなたを見つめる。{/n}「本心を現したな、{name}。これは…興味深い」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a barely audible gasp, and you cannot tell if his surprise is real or feigned.{/n} "Ah, a connoisseur of power in all its hues? Then..." {n}In a single move, he twists his arm out of your grasp and looks at you from beneath half-lowered lids.{/n} "You have made yourself clear, {name}. This could be... interesting."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは、かろうじて聞こえる程度にはっと息を呑む。しかしその驚きが本物なのか、それとも見せかけのものなのかは分からない。{/n}「ああ、色々な力の見せ方に通じているようだな。それなら…」{n}一気に腕をひねってあなたの手から逃れ、半分下がった瞼の下からあなたを見つめる。{/n}「本心を現したな、{name}。これは…興味深い」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai laisse échapper une exclamation à peine audible, et vous ne sauriez dire si sa surprise est sincère ou feinte.{/n} « Je vois que j'ai affaire à {mf|un expert|une experte} de l'autorité dans toutes ses nuances... Allons bon... » {n}D'un geste souple, il se libère de votre étreinte et vous regarde par-dessous ses paupières baissées.{/n} « Message reçu cinq sur cinq, {name}. Il n'en fallait pas plus pour éveiller ma... curiosité. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a barely audible gasp, and you cannot tell if his surprise is real or feigned.{/n} "Ah, a connoisseur of power in all its hues? Then..." {n}In a single move, he twists his arm out of your grasp and looks at you from beneath half-lowered lids.{/n} "You have made yourself clear, {name}. This could be... interesting."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai laisse échapper une exclamation à peine audible, et vous ne sauriez dire si sa surprise est sincère ou feinte.{/n} « Je vois que j'ai affaire à {mf|un expert|une experte} de l'autorité dans toutes ses nuances... Allons bon... » {n}D'un geste souple, il se libère de votre étreinte et vous regarde par-dessous ses paupières baissées.{/n} « Message reçu cinq sur cinq, {name}. Il n'en fallait pas plus pour éveiller ma... curiosité. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai stößt ein kaum hörbares Seufzen aus. Du weißt nicht, ob seine Überraschung echt oder gespielt ist.{/n} "Ah, Ihr wisst also die Macht in all ihren Facetten zu schätzen? Dann ..." {n}Mit einer einzigen Bewegung windet er seinen Arm aus deiner Umklammerung und blickt dich aus halb geschlossenen Lidern heraus an.{/n} "Ihr habt Euch deutlich ausgedrückt, {name}. Das könnte ... interessant werden."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a barely audible gasp, and you cannot tell if his surprise is real or feigned.{/n} "Ah, a connoisseur of power in all its hues? Then..." {n}In a single move, he twists his arm out of your grasp and looks at you from beneath half-lowered lids.{/n} "You have made yourself clear, {name}. This could be... interesting."

Dann ..." {n}Mit einer einzigen Bewegung windet er seinen Arm aus deiner Umklammerung und blickt dich aus halb geschlossenen Lidern heraus an.{/n} "Ihr habt Euch deutlich ausgedrückt, {name}. Das könnte ... interessant werden."

Then..." {n}In a single move, he twists his arm out of your grasp and looks at you from beneath half-lowered lids.{/n} "You have made yourself clear, . This could be... interesting."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai belli belirsiz bir iç çekiyor. Şaşkınlığı gerçek mi sahte mi anlayamıyorsun.{/n} "Aah... Her yönden baskın olacağım diyorsun demek. O hâlde..." {n}Tek bir hamleyle bileğini senden kurtarıp düşük göz kapaklarının ardından sana bakıyor.{/n} "Ben mesajı aldım {name}. İşler bayağı... İlginçleşiyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a barely audible gasp, and you cannot tell if his surprise is real or feigned.{/n} "Ah, a connoisseur of power in all its hues? Then..." {n}In a single move, he twists his arm out of your grasp and looks at you from beneath half-lowered lids.{/n} "You have made yourself clear, {name}. This could be... interesting."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, belli belirsiz bir iç çekiyor. Şaşkınlığı gerçek mi sahte mi anlayamıyorsun.{/n} "Aah... Her yönden baskın olacağım, diyorsun demek. O hâlde..." {n}Tek bir hamleyle bileğini senden kurtarıyor ve düşük göz kapaklarının ardından sana bakıyor.{/n} "Ben mesajı aldım {name}. İşler bayağı... İlginçleşiyor."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
